frontmatter.title: Coding underscore get
frontmatter.description: We often use _.get() function to safely retreive the properties inside deeply nested objects. I have seen codebases where underscore was put in just because of this great utility function. So just thought of coding it and turns out its pretty easy and fun.

frontmatter.title: How to build pastebins like jsbin, jsfiddle, dabblet
